snippet.title: Faery: Legends of Avalon! The Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Faery: Legends of Avalon unveils today its official and magical trailer, as well as its official website!
This is the opportunity to discover more the fantastical world of great this role-playing game packed with unique atmosphere and graphic style.

Prepare to live an extraordinary adventure, Faery: Legends of Avalon will be released on the 10th of November on Xbox LIVE® Arcade and early December on PlayStation® Network!
